# Mighty Hammer (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Book of Experimental Might I (Malhavoc Press), pg. 67

Your weapon, enhanced with the Godhammer discipline (see Chapter One: Classes of the Book of Experimental Might I), inflicts an additional 1d6 points of damage.
